name: Sorare: Fantasy Soccer
description:
Compose your lineups, track your teams, claim rewards and more, all in the Sorare app.

SET LINEUPS:
Join competitions and manage your teams from directly within the home screen of the app! Find an upcoming competition and compose your lineup through the Tournaments tab. View, edit, and manage all of your teams within your personal My Teams tab.

TRACK RESULTS:
Follow along as each Game Week develops to view the progress of your teams, watch your players rack up points and see where your team ranks in each tournament. Look back at the previous Game Week and check your lineups for the upcoming Game Week, all from the home screen of the app. Large, compelling player card visuals and detailed player stats highlight Decisive scores, All Around scores and more! Put your cards on display by sharing lineups and players with your friends.

CLAIM REWARDS:
Top the leaderboard this week? Claim your hard-earned rewards and show off your new cards by sharing with friends with the tap of a finger.

GET LIVE UPDATES:
Opt in to receive notifications about important moments as they unfold when your players score goals, make assists and earn points for your teams. Key updates are delivered straight to your phone the moment they happen with push notifications.
